section.title: Load balancer rules fail after changing network offering

formalpara.title: Symptom
formalpara.para: After changing the network offering on a network, load balancer rules stop working.

formalpara.title: Cause
formalpara.para: Load balancing rules were created while using a network service offering that includes an external load balancer device such as NetScaler, and later the network service offering changed to one that uses the &PRODUCT; virtual router.

formalpara.title: Solution
formalpara.para: Create a firewall rule on the virtual router for each of your existing load balancing rules so that they continue to function.
